WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you use your fingers to point when you compare things you're really just throwing around criticism. You should never need to point fingers when you're just comparing things. If you're pointing and picking and being mean, that's criticism.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Some criticism is okay, as long as it's constructive and it helps the person get better. But when you start pointing fingers, it's time to step back and try to not be such a jerk.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you're having trouble not giving out criticism, just think about how you would react if someone criticized you. You'd feel an embarrassed heat (ひ) rise throughout your body. That heat will cover your whole face.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Before you throw criticism around, imagine that embarrassed heat. You don't want to feel that way, so why would you do it to someone else?

humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hand ", " more than " sound, the original meaning is hit by hand. "Zuo Zhuan-Twelve Years of Zhuang Gong": "﹝Song Wan﹞ met the enemy, shepherd at the door, criticize and kill him."

" Approval " can mean offense. "Historical Records: Biography of the Assassin": "How can I see the grievances of the mausoleum, and want to criticize it!" Sima Zhensuoyin: "To criticize is to strike."

" Batch " refers to attack. Qing Yunjing "On Pengcheng, the Capital of the Western Chu Dynasty": "Collect the death of Yan and Zhao from the north, and draw the teacher from Jingcu to the south. You can gather your strength outside the Guan, and criticize the gap in the Guanzhong."

" Pan " also means to exclude or push away. "Historical Records-Biography of Wei Qiwu Anhou": "And Wei Qihou loses power, and also wants to rely on the husband to lead the rope to criticize the people who will be abandoned after their lives."

" Pan " also means cut and cut. The Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's "Qi Min Yao Shu ‧ Kind of Onions": "Two columbine retreat, pierce it, tie it at the waist, and tie it with the contract." Shi Sheng Han's note: "The criticism is split from it."

" Pan " also means instructions. Tang Huangtao, "Send to Serve the Emperor of Zi Lu Shan Hou": "Send the monk to take off the clothes, and the performance will be returned by the master."

" Pan " also refers to comments. Song Mifu's "Book History": "Wang Xianzhi's "Rihan Tie" contains miscellaneous traces of the Tang family, and there are two lines of Xie An's comments after printing."

" Criticism " also refers to judgment and selection. Yuan Yao Tongshou "Le Jiao Whispers": "(Yang Lianfu) then used his pen to approve the selection, but only four poems by Bao Xun, Zhang Yi, Gu Wenyu, and Jin Jiong."

" Batch " also refers to buying and selling goods in bulk and batches. "Jing Hua Yuan" Chapter 32: "This manifest is received by a large family, but it can be approved in three or two days."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " hand " and " bi ", the original meaning is hit by hand.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「比」聲，本義為用手擊。《左傳‧莊公十二年》：「﹝宋萬﹞遇仇牧于門，批而殺之。」

　　「批」可表示觸犯。《史記‧刺客列傳》：「奈何以見陵之怨，欲批其逆鱗哉！」司馬貞索隱：「批，謂觸擊之。」

　　「批」指攻擊。清惲敬〈西楚都彭城論〉：「北收燕趙之卒，南引荊邾之師，關外可厚集其勢，關中可迭批其隙。」

　　「批」也表示排除、推開。《史記‧魏其武安侯列傳》：「及魏其侯失勢，亦欲倚灌夫引繩批根生平慕之後棄之者。」

　　「批」亦表示剖、削。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧種蔥》：「兩耬重耩，竅瓠下之，以批契繫腰曳之。」石聲漢注：「批是從中劈破。」

　　「批」還表示批示。唐黃滔〈寄獻梓橦山侯侍御〉：「賜衣僧脫去，奏表主批還。」

　　「批」也指評語。宋米芾《書史》：「王獻之《日寒帖》，有唐氏雜跡，印後有兩行謝安批。」

　　「批」亦指評判、評選。元姚桐壽《樂郊私語》：「（楊廉夫）遂運筆批選，止取鮑恂、張翼、顧文煜、金炯四首。」

　　「批」也謂大量地、成批地買賣貨物。《鏡花緣》第32回：「這個貨單拿到大戶人家，不過三兩日就可批完。」

Radicals: 扌, 比  (fingers, compare)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you use your fingers to point when you compare things you're really just throwing around criticism. You should never need to point fingers when you're just comparing things. If you're pointing and picking and being mean, that's criticism.
Some criticism is okay, as long as it's constructive and it helps the person get better. But when you start pointing fingers, it's time to step back and try to not be such a jerk.
Reading Mnemonic
If you're having trouble not giving out criticism, just think about how you would react if someone criticized you. You'd feel an embarrassed heat (ひ) rise throughout your body. That heat will cover your whole face.
Before you throw criticism around, imagine that embarrassed heat. You don't want to feel that way, so why would you do it to someone else?
